info.description: Implementation of backend for online banking UI. We have 3 preloaded users in Ledgers: marion.mueller, anton.brueckner, max.musterman all with the PIN 12345. You can use the User Login API from Ledgers /users/authorise2 endpoint to gain an access token. Then use the access token with the prefix 'Bearer ' to Authorize on this ui.
info.title: Online banking
info.termsOfService: Terms of Service: to be edited...

authorisation_id.description: The last authorisation id leading to this token

consent.description: The specification of psd2 account access permission associated with this token

login.description: The login name of the initiator of this token

role.description: Role to be inforced when this token is presented.

sca_id.description: The id of the sca object: login, payment, account access

sub.description: The database id of the initiator of this token

bban.description: BBAN: This data elements is used for payment accounts which have no IBAN

iban.description: IBAN: This data element can be used in the body of the CreateConsentReq Request Message for retrieving account access consent from this payment account

maskedPan.description: MASKEDPAN: Primary Account Number (PAN) of a card in a masked form.

msisdn.description: MSISDN: An alias to access a payment account via a registered mobile phone number. This alias might be needed e.g. in the payment initiation service, cp. Section 5.3.1. The support of this alias must be explicitly documented by the ASPSP for the corresponding API calls.

pan.description: PAN: Primary Account Number (PAN) of a card, can be tokenized by the ASPSP due to PCI DSS requirements.

resourceId.description: RESOURCE-ID: This identification is denoting the addressed account.

allPsd2.description: Consent on all accounts, balances and transactions of psu

availableAccounts.description: Consent on all available accounts of psu

access.description: Set of accesses given by psu for this account

frequencyPerDay.description: Maximum frequency for an access per day. For a once-off access, this attribute is set to 1

recurringIndicator.description: 'true', if the consent is for recurring access to the account data , 'false', if the consent is for one access to the account data

validUntil.description: Consent`s expiration date. The content is the local ASPSP date in ISODate Format

account.description: Account, where the confirmation of funds service is aimed to be submitted to.

cardExpiryDate.description: Expiry date of the card issued by the PIISP

cardInformation.description: Additional explanation for the card product.

cardNumber.description: Card Number of the card issued by the PIISP. Should be delivered if available.

registrationInformation.example: Your contract Number 1234 with MyMerchant is completed with the registration with your bank.
registrationInformation.description: Additional information about the registration process for the PSU, e.g. a reference to the TPP / PSU contract.

tppAuthorisationNumber.description: Tpp attribute that fully described Tpp for which the consent will be created. If the property is omitted, the consent will be created for all TPPs

validUntil.description: Consent`s expiration date. The content is the local ASPSP date in ISODate Format
